website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with wholesome ingredients that rabbits can’t resist, including peas, carrots, and beets, this healthful vitamin-packed mixture is as nutritious as it is delicious.
pros: Timothy grass hay is the first ingredient
Contains essential nutrients like DHA, vitamin D3, and Omega 3 fatty acids
Fortified with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants
cons: Although this is a quality rabbit diet, the price for 4 lbs
of food may seem a little high

customer_reviews.title: possibly different formula used in the pellets?
customer_reviews.text: My rescue bunny began eating this brand as his first real food after weaning him off of milk. He used to eat all of the bits available but with the second bag, which is the one ordered from Amazon, he leaves behind all of the little pellets. I am not sure what it is about those but from experience with my other animals, when they do not want something it is often not good for them so I wonder what changed with the formula.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bunny and she ignores some of the pieces and picks out specific pieces she likes. I don't mind it at all, i'm just concerned that she's not getting all her nutrients. Gonna use up the bag, since I spent money on it, but will not repurchase. Wish it worked, you get a lot for what you pay for, but my bunny is either picky or doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Best food ever
customer_reviews.text: Well they ask about flavor I'm not sure how it taste I'm not rabbit but my two netherland dwarfs and my dutch dog this food they dont want any other brand except this one if I ho in store it cost me for 4lbs almost 10 dollars and for 8 pounds is almost 20 dollars I'm glad I found it on Amazon it's cheap and fast delivery. This is my 5 order and I will keep buying it great product and my rabbits are thankful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It could be better...
customer_reviews.text: This product has a bit too much of the filler bits. Rabbits require a good quality pellet, rather than the additives. I purchased a bag of Oxbow Timothy Hay Pellets to add to the bag. Oddly, one of the bags had more filler than the other. And it will get your bunny used to eating the junk, rather than healthy. Not sure I'll buy again, if so will definitely add the Oxbow pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit's favorite pet food
customer_reviews.text: I always buy my rabbit's food on Amazon, and this is his favorite one. This is the only mix that doesn't have pieces my bunny leaves in the bowl. Twice a day, he puts his little front legs on the edge of his dish and waits for his Vitasmart. It's pretty adorable.
customer_reviews.author: musicianmom

customer_reviews.title: Some bunny doesn't like this!
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit food is of little value of the rabbit won't eat it. And that is the case here. The rabbit wouldn't even eat it after a day with no other food. Don't waste your money. Or we might have a picky bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this food.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this rabbit food once before and he seemed to like it. I ordered again because I didn't have time to get to the store. It came Tuesday and I opened the bag yesterday 8/31/19. When I went to feed our bunny today he was acting strange but still nuzzled my hand as usual when I put the food bowl in. My husband went down about an hour later and he had died. I'm not sure if it was the food or because he was 6. But earlier in the week he was behaving normally.
customer_reviews.author: Emliz02

customer_reviews.title: My Rabbits LOVE Vitakraft!
customer_reviews.text: I have had pet rabbits for over 12 years and I keep coming back to VitaKraft! I have tried Oxbow, KayTee, Sunseed, Ecotrition. You name it, I've tried it and they always hop to their dish with VitaKraft. I love the ingredients and they like to pick out what they want but there is so much nutrition and variety in the bag, that I am okay if they leave out a few pellets!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s rabbit food.
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit prefers this over other foods tried, but still doesn’t like the smaller kernels and leaves them in her bowl. She’s finicky at best though. She’s about 8 years old and still healthy, so I’ll keep getting this. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heins57

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good quality healthy food
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves this food it smells like fresh hay and has lots of healthy bits of seeds in it. She loves it so much that she now throws her bowl around my room to let me know she wants more !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VitaSmart Rabbit Food
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit is pretty picky about what he eats, he does like this food but he does pick out the good stuff and leave the pellets. He might eventually eat them if I don't refill his bowl but so far it's the only food that he eats most of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good mixture
customer_reviews.text: Other than item being delivered to my neighbor's house, this is good food for our bunny. Anikin Skyhopper loves it
customer_reviews.author: JChandler

customer_reviews.title: Our rabbit’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only food our pet rabbit will eat now! He used to eat generic pellets, but once he tried this mixture- he refuses to eat anything else
customer_reviews.author: kdp70

customer_reviews.title: Sugar’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My late bunny only ate vitakraft :) He’ve had a lots of personality and was an extremely picky eater. I’m grateful for the subscription option as stores offer run out of it. I’m keeping my subscription as I’m getting two baby bucks this week.
customer_reviews.author: Giaomgia

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bunny loves all the chunks of veggies in it but leaves behind the kibble part but overall it’s one of his favorite foods!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Grey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable rabbit food
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves every part of the food mix, except the big pellets, which he won't touch.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: The Good Stuff With Some Reservation
customer_reviews.text: Great food for the most part - our rabbit loves it except for the basic 'kibble' - a picky eater, what to do. One star down for the % of the bag that is crushed product - unusable dust - and not up to the quality of this premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Mingaa

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: my bunny loves it. Great variety of things. Wouls definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: laurie gates

customer_reviews.title: My Rosey loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny Rosey loves this rabbit food. I have tried many others and she leaves most of it in her bowl. This brand she eats about every bite!
customer_reviews.author: Gatorfan

customer_reviews.title: My bunny loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny definitely likes this food and she even eats the timothy pellets. I always had to buy a bag of the thinner pellets with the other brand that I was using because she only ate the colorful pieces. I am saving so much money because she eats all of her food now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No the same quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not the same in all bags, ones have too much hay pellets and nothing of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel J.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd review
customer_reviews.text: Wrote wrong review, my product is not out of date, read the exp wrong sorry sorry sorry
customer_reviews.author: Avril Charnley

customer_reviews.title: My Bunny Loves This Food
customer_reviews.text: My Lionhead Rabbit loves this food. He is pretty picky and will eat all of the large pieces and then pick at the smaller ones. The price is not bad on Amazon compared to the prices at my local pet stores. I've been using this food for the last 2 years and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb613

customer_reviews.title: Good food for the money
customer_reviews.text: This food is lower end- but my rabbit likes it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies love this food
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies love this food. When I actually make it to the feed store and get them a different kind they do not like it. They really like this kind.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great convenience
customer_reviews.text: Don't have to run out to store, which makes me feel safer!
customer_reviews.author: ILISA

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit likes it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my rabbit's food was discontinued. He is picky so I was really worried whether he would eat it (we had been through two other brands he would hardly touch). He likes this alot, although he will eat everything and leave the alfalfa until last.
customer_reviews.author: humdinger

customer_reviews.title: Wild Bunny Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this several times to feed the wild bunnies in my yard. They seem to love it! They tend to pick out the fiesta pieces more though!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Good for dwarf rabbit
customer_reviews.text: My dwarf rabbit loves this food. She won’t eat anything else
customer_reviews.author: Katie M. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Eats every bit
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini rex and he loves this food. I've tried other brands and sometimes he has issues with his stool. He usually eats all of this food and has little to no digestion issues.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: The girls love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our bunnies love this food! We have been feeding Vitasmart for a while now and our buns are happy and healthy. Of course, we also give them plenty of hay, fresh veggies, and fruit but they definitely enjoy snacking on this as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roush

customer_reviews.title: More treats!
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit would be happier if it had no pellets and all treats. :-) He makes such a mess pulling his bowl out of the cage and dumping it out so he can get the good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: A. Schartz

customer_reviews.title: My bunny loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves his munchy food! He gets a quarter cup a day, and he will run between my feet in excitement for it. This is my go-to rabbit food!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit loves this stuff! After doing LOTS of ...
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves this stuff! After doing LOTS of research, it is also the most balanced and nutritious I can feed him. Thanks for making it affordable, amazon!
customer_reviews.author: stefSF

customer_reviews.title: My BunBun loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Rabbit, BunBun loves it, and he's a pretty picky eater. 1 scoop a day is usually all I give him along with Timothy Hay, Kale, and other nutritious treats.
customer_reviews.author: Cold War Veteran MP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits favorite food, the only one that doesn’t hurt his stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies won't eat anything else but this.
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies are spoiled but they finish this up. I just wish there was more actual food than just pellets. Bunnies don't eat the pellets but all the colored stuff they do.
customer_reviews.author: Ubaid Seth

customer_reviews.title: My buns love this, though they prefer the treats to the ...
customer_reviews.text: My buns love this, though they prefer the treats to the pellets. I think all buns are like that though
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L Talley

customer_reviews.title: This is his favorite food by far
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit likes to eat all the “good” pieces first, leaving all the regular pellets for last. This is his favorite food by far.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Mini Rex coat looking good.
customer_reviews.text: My bun loves it. His coat (mini rex) is looking better since I started him on this feed. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Honey loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Honey, our bunny, loves this stuff! It's a great supplement to her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy2

customer_reviews.title: Ok as a side dish.  Not the main course
customer_reviews.text: Not very healthy for the bunny. Too much "extras". Ok if served in addition to rabbit pellets.
customer_reviews.author: gymbok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves this food! So convenient to have it delivered to the house. It comes the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits love it and it's good for them!
customer_reviews.text: The rabbits love this stuff, they don't want to eat anything else but this.
customer_reviews.author: erdco

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my rabbit will eat! Good product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Bunny LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny LOVES this food! It has a lot of a colored tidbits that she goes crazy over. I didn't know there was a difference in bunny food. Apparently, there is...
customer_reviews.author: cupcakejoe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food for our rabbits but the more I buy the higher the price goes up ..Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lois McCann

customer_reviews.title: Ok but too much snacks.
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits are crazy about all the rabbit foods I've ever bought for them except this one, they eat it only when they are quite hungry. Besides, there are too much snacks in it and I think it may not be good for rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: in best shape, rabbits like food
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, in best shape, rabbits like food, A-OK!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

product_meta.title: Vitakraft VitaSmart Complete Nutrition Pet Rabbit Food
product_meta.description: Size:4 lbsVitaSmart Rabbit is more than just another high-quality food line. Rich in timothy grass, essential fatty acids, omegas and more, this rabbit food contains the formula your rabbit needs for complete and balanced nutrition. Support your rabbit's health with Vitakraft's Vitasmart Rabbit Food which features a high level of fiber-packed timothy grass. Specially designed to support complete health and well being – a well-rounded feeding program to support not only healthy growth and development, but also to optimize health and wellness during middle age and maturity.
feature_bullets: Contains Dha Omega 3'S; Antioxidants; Complexed Minerals And Probiotics For A Healthy Lifestyle.
Rich In Protein With Timothy Grass.
Dha Omega 3’S To Support Brain Health, Heart Function, Vision, A Healthy Coat And Strong Immune System.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
